question: How much does OWLsec charge to join?
answer:
OWLsec is absolutely, 100% FREE to join. Our community is based on Discord, at this time, with plans to expand to other platforms.
We will never ask members to pay a premium to join.

question: Does OWLsec offer any Premium Services?
answer:
As of December, 2022, the OWLsec community services are entirely free.
However, premium OWLsec memberships will be available in 2023. Premium memberships will be added to our existing community, which will consist of detailed lessons, exclusive materials, priority access to experts, bonus merch, and much more.
Any member who prefers not to enroll in an OWLsec Premium Membership will continue to keep their access to our robust community without needing to worry about losing anything.

question: How do I become a member of OWLsec?
answer: Oh, that's easy! Just goto: skid.owlsec.co
